EmailTemplate.subject: Openbravo Orisha - Forgotten Password
EmailTemplate.body:
<#if user.firstName??> Hello ${user.firstName} <#else> Hello ${user.username} </#if>
We've received a request to regenerate your password for your Openbravo - Orisha Retail Chain Account.
Click on the link below to create your new password. ${change_password_url}
If you have not been requesting a new password, please contact your IT system to alert them about this request.
Remember that the link will be valid for ${reset_password_timeout} minutes.
Best Regards
